= Introduction=

These are the language and compiler definitions for XCode 3.0 and up.

= File Types =

== .[pbfilespec] ==

Defines file types and their poperties.

== .[xcbuildrules] ==

Defines which compiler types are to be used for which file types

== .[xclangspec] ==

Defines syntax highligting and recognition for langages.

== .[xcsynspec] ==

Defines syntax types

== .[xcspec] ==

Defines Compilers, Tools, Architectures, Package Types, Product Types and more.

== .[xctxtmacro] ==

Macros and snippets.
